org.smtlib

Interface IExpr.IBinaryLiteral

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAccept, IExpr, IExpr.IAttributeValue, IExpr.ILiteral, IPos.IPosable, IResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Lexer.LexBinaryLiteral, SMTExpr.BinaryLiteral
    Enclosing interface:
    IExpr

    public static interface IExpr.IBinaryLiteral
extends IExpr.ILiteral
    This interface represents SMT-LIB binary literals
